name: CM H
text: I always have a positive experience here. Love the pizza. Love the service. Love that I can call in my order and pick it up at my convenience. We turn on the oven at home to pre-heat it, drop by Papa Murphy's on our way home from picking …More

name: Nagorg Ydnar
text:
This is a favorite for our family.  We like the fresh aspect of cooking your pizza at home and Papa Murphy's has some deliciousness for sure.
The staff is always friendly and their service is pretty fast.  If you're in a hurry or in a budget, the 5 dollar faves are hard to beat!

name: David Shugart
text: Might be nice if the hours posted on your website were the sames hours at the store.  Arrived at 8:05 Saturday 4/14/2018 and the employees were just leaving and locked the door.  Your website states open until 9:00 on Fridays and Saturdays.

name: Stanley Wood SR
text: Let me start.with that we have used his place many times without any issues. Today we called in 3 pizzas about a hour ago 4:30 and told them we should be there in 45 min. We showed up and have waited for them to fix every walkin first. Only 1 person working. Very frustrated. I hope management sees this and fixes the issue.

name: Arielle Grove
text: I want to start this review by saying i have worked in food for a long time and i know that there are bad days and mistakes can be made. That being said i came in about an hour and a half before close. When i walked in the store was empty …More

name: Caroline M
text: Love this place.  Folks are always nice, helpful and friendly.  Went to a different chain store in Trophy Club ONCE.....ONLY ONCE, that was enough.

name: Rob M
text: Service upsets me. Past few times I have gone in, kids look impatient and discontent and don't offer help when ordering for best value, options, etc and walk out scratching my head on why a couple pizzas cost $40. Whoever owns this joint …More

name: David Kim
text: It's really not that bad. For most people it makes sense just to order delivery but this is pretty good too.

name: Aydrian Barthold
text: This Papa Murphy's is amazing and changed my life.  It is the best Papa Murphy's in the area and the staff is very friendly and helpful.

name: Cory Mallory
text: Good customer service, and great food. What more could you ask for?

name: Derek Frank
text: Very rude! The owner harassed me after calling 2 months ago. He found my snap chat and threatened me for no reason! Very unprofessional...

name: Dale Stinyard
text: Tried it. Liked it they were friendly
